reasoning_log: The matching process prioritized unique spaces first (Kitchen, Balcony, Rooftop, Entrance, Empty Room). The remaining challenge was differentiating between the multiple views of the living room and the two similar bathrooms and master bedroom views. Desc_6 (次臥1) was matched to the only empty bedroom ([Image_7]). Desc_7 and Desc_8 were assigned to the two distinct views of the master bedroom ([Image_8] and [Image_9]). Desc_11 was assigned to the other furnished bedroom ([Image_12]). The four living/dining descriptions were matched to the four most representative views: Desc_4 to the dining close-up ([Image_5]), Desc_3 to the combined view ([Image_3]), and Desc_1/Desc_2 to the two main living room angles ([Image_1] and [Image_2]). Image_4, which is another combined living/dining view, was identified as redundant.

matching_result_list.evidence: Main living room view showing the sofa, coffee table, and TV feature wall, emphasizing the square layout and partial decoration.
Wider angle of the living room, emphasizing the open visual space and smooth flow, fitting the '視覺開闊' tag.
View showing the connection between the living area (foreground) and the dining/hallway area (background), illustrating the combined space and flow.
Close-up view of the dining table and chairs, confirming a '正常用餐空間' with simple, complete walls and indirect ceiling lighting.
Long, covered outdoor space with metal railings, matching the '大面積陽台' and '安全欄杆' tags.
The only completely empty bedroom, fitting the '空間彈性大' and '收納需自行規劃' tags.
Main view of the furnished master bedroom, showing the bed, side table, and decorative wall paneling, confirming '已部分家具'.
Another angle of the master bedroom (or highly similar room), focusing on the wall space and furniture placement, matching '主臥另一視角'.
Bathroom view showing the shower area and vanity, confirming '乾濕不分離' and '空間偏緊湊'.
Second bathroom view, also '乾濕不分離', showing the toilet and vanity from a different angle.
Secondary bedroom that is '已附床組' (furnished bed set) but requires additional storage.
Independent kitchen space with I-shaped counter, stove, hood, and sufficient upper/lower white cabinets.

tag_list: 瓦斯爐與排油煙機齊全

matching_result_list.evidence: Large, unfinished space with corrugated metal walls and concrete floor, clearly matching '頂樓鐵皮空間'.
Ground floor area showing parked motorcycles and old stairs, matching '一樓騎樓/出入口' and '機車停放空間'.
